settings.title: 5 Days of Giveaways
settings.text: Day 4! FREE travel-size Power Serum with orders $99+. Peptide-packed anti-aging serum improves skin firmness and volume and reduces fine lines and wrinkles. Ends 12/06/19 at 11:59 pm PT.

settings.title: "C" A Firmer Future
settings.text: Youth-boosting mini duo! Includes deluxe mini Firma-Bright 20% Booster Serum and deluxe mini Power Lift Moisturizer. Firma-Bright Vitamin C Booster includes free-radical fighting antioxidants and radiance boosting peptides to protect skin and improve the appearance of dullness, fine lines and wrinkles. Power Lift Moisturizer features pineapple ceramides and shea butter to lock in moisture and gravity-fighting peptides to plump skin.

settings.title: Eye-Opening
settings.text: Free mini Eye Authority and single PolyPeptide Collagel+ Eye Mask sachet with orders $125+. The perfect eye duo to brighten, smooth, hydrate and de-puff the eye area. Ends 12/25/19 at 11:59 pm PT.

settings.title: Sleep Pretty
settings.text: This ultra-hydrating set from our new Restore collection is designed to work with your skin’s natural circadian rhythm to give you softer, more luminous skin overnight.

settings.title: Clean Getaway
settings.text: This travel-ready set from our Detox collection is designed to keep your skin flawlessly hydrated and protected whether you’re on the road or in the sky.

settings.title: Power Players
settings.text: Rich & Powerful Limited Edition Set is back! Full-size Power Lift and Power Serum, for just $199 ($243 value)!

settings.title: The Firming Vibrant-C Facial
settings.text: This potent, patented vitamin C facial treatment is perfect for those looking to bring back a youthful firmness and glow. A vitamin C enzyme peel combined with a unique, pure vitamin C delivery system and double mask encourage firming and brightening. You will leave relaxed, radiant and on your way to firmer skin.

settings.subtitle:
How To Tailor 

Your Genes
settings.text: Learn how skincare formulated by a geneticist using epigenetic science (aka gene tailoring) can boost the health and beauty of your skin.

settings.title: Gene-ius Skincare
settings.text: We believe in 'gene-ius' skincare that's clinically proven and a pleasure to use. That's why we use the leading-edge science of epigenetics and peptides plus our sensory expertise to formulate results-driven, luxurious skincare products and professional treatments that make you look and feel amazing.

settings.title: Science
settings.text:
What Is Epigenetics?
Our genes determine how we look and how our skin ages. But that's not the whole story. With epigenetic science, we can influence how genes express themselves by essentially turning on genes that signal cells to act healthy and turning off the genes that don't. Clear as mud? How about an example....

Epigenetics In Action
For example, our Chief Geneticist, Dr. Neal Kitchen, and his IDENTICAL twin brother, Dale have the exact same DNA but they don't look same. The reason? Epigenetics. Environmental factors starting in the womb signaled their genes to express themselves differently rendering Neal about 3 inches shorter than his brother. Neal likes to say that Dale got the height but he got the good looks.

Epigenetics & Your Skin
Epigenetics absolutely applies to the genes that control your skin cells. HydroPeptide's team of geneticists formulate our products with powerful gene signaling ingredients, like peptides, that tell your skin cells to act in a healthy, gorgeous way. YAY!

We Have A Passion For Peptides
As you can tell from our name, we use a lot of peptides in our products. In fact, peptides, and their incredible skin benefits, are how we got started. We love peptides because they're one of the most effective epigenetic tools in skin care and we utilize them extensively in our transformative formulas. But peptides aren't the only effective epigenetic powerhouse ingredients out there. There are many more and we're committed to bringing all of them to you through innovative, clinically proven skincare.

settings.title: Sensory Experience
settings.text:
We Want You To Enjoy Using Our Products

Clinical results are key to our philosophy but we also believe that taking care of your skin should be a luxurious experience. We collaborate with the top minds in spa, wellness and sensory design to infuse each product and treatment regimen with an exquisite, feel-fabulous experience.

settings.title: Skin Expertise
settings.text:
We Love Aestheticians
We believe the aesthetician's skill and customer focus is the backbone of the skincare industry. We incorporate their expertise into every one of our products and strive to support and partner with them whenever we can.

settings.title: Our Team & Location
settings.text:
HydroPeptide is located near the rainforests of the Pacific Northwest US, home to other powerhouse technology and lifestyle companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Boeing, Starbucks, and Nordstrom.

This lush, stimulating backdrop fuels our passion for developing the most effective, and most luxurious skincare products and treatment regimens. We love what we do!

settings.subtitle: Welcome to The Gene-ius where you'll find expert skincare advice, spa and aesthetician features and the latest HydroPeptide news and info.

settings.content:
Q&A With HydroPeptide’s Skincare Experts

Attention skincare obsessives, beauty junkies and anyone who just wants great skin. At HydroPeptide, we know that taking care of your skin can be confusing. What products should I use? When should I use it? Will it make me break out? Our team of geneticists and aestheticians are here to help.

Contact us at AskExpert@hydropeptide.com with your questions and we’ll get back to you with personalized information. We want to hear from you!

settings.paragraphtext: Find a spa near you and treat yourself to a luxe HydroPeptide facial or body treatment for instant and long term results without downtime.

settings.subheading:
Need some help picking the perfect product for your mom?

settings.title: Mother's Day Gifts
Clean Skincare for a Professional-Grade Routine
settings.short_text: Our clinically proven ingredients are used and loved in treatment rooms around the globe. Feel confident about your skincare results and build a routine you will truly love.

settings.testimonial: With over 15 years of experience in professional skincare, we’ve been at the forefront of peptide technology—our touchstone for creating scientifically-advanced, easy-to-use products. Take the spa home with our clinically proven, award-winning formulas.

settings.heading: Polish & Plump Peel
settings.description:
Smooth, plump and pamper like a spa professional with this highly effective 2-step system. The dual-action exfoliation treatment is amplified by micro-exfoliants and 5% lactic acid for smoother, more radiant skin in 5 minutes or less.
Results: Instant brightening, smoothing, and boosts collagen.

settings.heading: Triple Acid Peptide Peel
settings.description:
In this leave on face peel, a combination of a triple acid complex, an algae extract, and skin renewing peptides enhance your skin’s natural glow and reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and dark spots over time.
Results: Ideal for brightening, smoothing, and protecting from environmental stressors.

settings.heading: 5X Power Peel
settings.description:
These gentle daily exfoliating pads use 5 different kinds of chemical exfoliants to break down the bonds between dead skin cells and encourage cell turnover.
Results: Addressing breakouts and provides instant brightening.

settings.heading: Gifts Under $40
settings.description: Packable, portable gifts that ensure that you have glowing, healthy skin wherever you go!

settings.headline: The Latest
settings.featured_article_title: How to find the perfect moisturizer for your skin type
settings.featured_article_excerpt: Finding the right moisturizer for your skin is essential to your...

settings.title: We Teach Your Skin To Act Younger
settings.text: HydroPeptide uses Epigenetic Science + clinically proven peptides to improve the youth of your skin cells for age-defying, radiant results.

settings.title: Treat Your Skin Like A Pro
settings.short_text: Lead by our chief geneticist, we formulate  with powerful cell signaling ingredients to maximize your skin’s youth. We partner with skincare professionals around the globe to achieve age-defying results.

settings.title: Optimize Your Skin's Age at the Cellular Level
settings.content:
You have more control than you think over how your skin ages. Things like nutrition, sun, and smoking can affect how your skin looks.

The good news is, so can our geneticist developed skincare designed to optimize your skin’s cellular health. Because healthy cells means younger looking skin!

settings.title: Ingredients Selected for Maximum Results
settings.content:
Epigenetic skincare looks at what signals your cells to behave in an optimum state. We test cellular function and how cells respond to topical ingredients.

We select ingredients that message the skin to act act healthier, protecting it from internal and external stress, and signaling your skin to turn on more of what you want and turn off what you don’t want.

settings.title: Peptides Are the #1 Tool in Our Youth-Building Aresenal
settings.content:
We use over 60 peptides at clinical levels to increase hydration, visibly reduce lines and wrinkles and enhance skin's natural radiance.

We pair our peptides with supportive ingredients that optimize their delivery and target specific skin concerns like loss of collagen, discoloration and other common signs of aging.

settings.title: Advanced Delivery Systems & Skin Analysis
settings.content:
We are continuously investing in the latest technology, both in our formulas and through our partnerships, to find the most advanced ways to deliver and measure noticeable results.

Look for our Power Serum Glass Slipper treatment when booking your next HydraFacial or ask your doctor or esthetician about getting a skin analysis and custom regimen with our Skinformatix Pro machine next time you book a HydroPeptide facial.

settings.subheading: Clean Science For Long Term Skin Health
settings.title: Investing in the Long-Term Health and Beauty of Your Skin
settings.content:
Some common skincare ingredients may provide an immediate result on the skin, however they might not support the long term health of your skin.

We avoid ingredients that cause inflammation or irritation, and exclude harmful ingredients like genotoxins. 100% of our products are formulated without parabens, sulfates and phthalates.

settings.title: Trusted & Tested in Treatment Rooms Worldwide
settings.content:
HydroPeptide is a professional brand developed for Dermatologists, Plastic Surgeons and Estheticians. We support professionals by incorporating their expertise into every product and protocol we create. This collaboration gives our partners the confidence that they can provide age-defying results in their treatment rooms and between visit regimens.

Use our locator to find a HydroPeptide treatment near you.

settings.title: The Ritual of Caring for Yourself & Skin
settings.content:
We are not only focused on the change you will see in your skin, but how you feel when using the products. We formulate to provide a sensorial experience with luxurious textures and uplifting scents.

As your home care regimen between visits we want to deliver a spa like experience to your daily rituals.

settings.heading: 3-Step Anti-Aging Skincare Regimen
settings.description: Get ready for a huge transformation with this power-packed anti-aging trio.

settings.heading: 3-Step Brightening Skincare Regimen
settings.description: This brightening and firming trio is shown to promote the appearance of healthy collagen production and leave skin smoother, brighter and more even-toned.

settings.heading: 3-Step Eye-Care Regimen
settings.description: Instantly awaken dull, tired eyes! This hydrating and brightening eye trio minimizes the appearance of puffiness, fine lines and wrinkles over time.

settings.heading: Nimni Cream
settings.description: This patented anti-aging booster cream is formulated with one-of-a-kind Nimni™ Technology to visibly improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Time release retinol aids in cell turnover and has clinically been shown to promote the appearance of healthy collagen production and leaves skin smoother, brighter and more even-toned.

settings.heading: Nimni Day Cream
settings.description: The Nimni Support Complex in Nimni Day Cream is designed to support your skin's natural production of collagen. Formulated with powerful antioxidants, Nimni Day is ideal for mixing into your daytime cream to give improved protection from environmental pollutants.

settings.heading: Nimni Dream Team
settings.description: Day & Night Lifting, Firming, Line-eliminating System. Indulge in this age defying dream team that helps support healthy collagen production for a noticeably firmer, plumper and brighter complexion.

settings.title: New HydroPeptide Affiliate Partner Program
settings.first-section-text: HydroPeptide firmly believes that our success is tied to the success of our affiliate partners. Because of this belief, we treat our affiliate partners with as much care as we treat our customers. Join the HydroPeptide affiliate program today and start earning commissions by telling your audience about our universal formulations that help fight signs of aging and address various skin care concerns in the fewest steps possible. Overall, HydroPeptide is scientific beauty made simple.
settings.top-left-text: Earn a competitive commission rate of up to 10%
settings.top-right-text: 30-day cookie—You get credit for orders within 30 days of the original click placed by the customer
settings.bottom-left-text: Exclusive newsletters with special content, opportunities, and product launches that you can adapt for your own marketing efforts
settings.bottom-right-text: Award-winning Affiliate management team from Acceleration Partners, dedicated to your success
settings.last-section-text:
Our affiliate partnerships team will be happy to answer any of your questions about joining or being part of our program.
Please note that if you did not receive a confirmation e-mail from Pepperjam when you applied for the program, your application may not have been completed properly and/or the email might be in your spam email folder.
Please email our affiliate team at hydropeptide@accelerationpartners.com with any questions.

If you are unfamiliar with how partner marketing works, reference these FAQs for more information.

We are looking forward to working together!

settings.aging-product-description:
Crushed pearl powder, peptides, and plankton extract instantly brighten the eye area.

Why we love it

⬡ Relaxes the look of crow's feet

⬡ Visibly brightens under eye circles

⬡ Reduces the look of puffiness
settings.drySkin-product-description:
This tinted SPF instantly adapts to any skin tone for a healthy glow.

Why we love it

⬡ Provides antioxidant protection

⬡ Reef-safe formula

⬡ Covers minor imperfections
settings.acne-product-description:
Foaming peptides allow for a moisture-rich lather without the use of parabens or sulfates.

Why we love it

⬡ Cleanses away impurities

⬡ Reduces the look of redness over time

⬡ Improves the look of fine lines and wrinkles
settings.brightening-product-description:
Carefully formulated to deliver a thirst-quenching hit of triple-weight hyaluronic acid.

Why we love it

⬡ 93% immediately agreed their skin felt more hydrated

⬡ 80% immediately noticed a smoother texture of their skin
settings.oily-product-description:
Collagen-supporting peptides reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

Why we love it

⬡ Helps deliver a firmer appearance to your skin

⬡ Provides immediate hydration

⬡ Helps to calm and cool skin
settings.sensitive-product-description:
13 precious oils make up this nutrient-rich, fast-absorbing facial oil.

Why we love it

⬡ Nourishes and hydrates skin

⬡ Improves skin barrier function

⬡ Immediately softens skin
